alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Inlet Area; Eastern Strait of Juan de Fuca; Western Skagit County; Western Strait of Juan De Fuca; Western Whatcom County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 25 at 1:46AM PDT until October 26 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Western Whatcom County, Western Skagit County, Admiralty Inlet Area, Eastern Strait of Juan de Fuca and Western Strait of Juan De Fuca. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 9 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest chances of frost formation will be areas away from water sources. Additional frosts and possible hard freezes are possible each night through Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Admiralty Inlet Area; Eastern Strait of Juan de Fuca; Western Skagit County; Western Strait of Juan De Fuca; Western Whatcom County
